title: Part 2: Made-Up Movie + News (ACS June 30)
itunes:title: Part 2: Made-Up Movie + News (ACS June 30)
description:
The gang plays a game of ‘Made-Up Movie’ with titles such as ‘The Seventh Day’, ‘Load Management’, and ‘Final Expenses’. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: R. Kelly sentenced to 30 years in prison, updates on the January 6th hearings, Delta pilots picketing amid surging flight cancellations, and the Uvalde shooter’s grandmother recovering from her gunshot wound. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

Geico.com 

SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

FreezePipe.com enter CAROLLA

SoloStove.com enter ADAM
